professional_summary: Motivated Junior Backend Developer with 1.5 years of self-directed Java/Spring practice, reinforced by a proven record in B2B sales, data analysis and client success across SaaS and international markets. Adept at designing RESTful APIs, modeling relational data and translating business requirements into technical solutions. Currently building SalesMetricsAPI to merge sales analytics with backend engineering. Guided by a self-taught software-developer mentor and committed to continuous learning.

experience.title: Freelance Sales Specialist
achievements: Built multichannel prospecting systems (HubSpot/Apollo) and automated CRM pipelines
Designed data-driven messaging, boosting lead response rates for 3 clients
Leveraged SQL & BI dashboards to advise on revenue KPIs
Managed client relationships and delivered measurable business results

experience.title: Sales Specialist
achievements: Drove digital campaigns that increased qualified inquiries by 15%
Collaborated with product & engineering to align outreach with feature releases
Analyzed campaign performance data to optimize conversion rates
Contributed to cross-functional team success in fast-paced startup environment

experience.title: Client Solution Consultant
achievements: Created Power BI dashboards and Oracle SQL scripts that cut operational costs 20%
Presented technical insights to senior stakeholders for data-driven decisions
Automated reporting processes improving efficiency and accuracy
Translated complex data analytics into actionable business recommendations

experience.title: International Account Manager
achievements: Managed $6M portfolio (Uber, Huawei, Roche) achieving top close ratio
Received Summit Sales Award 2022 for highest international performance
Built and maintained strategic relationships with enterprise clients
Exceeded revenue targets consistently through consultative selling approach

projects.name: SalesMetricsAPI
projects.description: Spring Boot + JPA + MySQL service tracking prospecting actions and computing weekly/monthly KPIs. Implements Bean-validated DTOs, layered architecture, custom error handling, and CSV/Excel export via Apache POI.

projects.name: Spring Pet Clinic (clone)
projects.description: Multi-module CRUD application for pets/owners/veterinarians management. Clean architecture with services, repositories, and controllers. H2 in-memory database integration with TDD exercises.

education.details: Strong foundation in business strategy, data analysis, and project management

additional_info.mentorship: Guided weekly by a self-taught software-developer mentor (code reviews, best practices)
additional_info.career_focus: Junior Backend Developer - Java & Spring Boot | Business-oriented | B2B Sales Background
additional_info.unique_value: Unique combination of technical skills and business acumen, with proven ability to translate business requirements into technical solutions
